branchCategory.name: PFMB
branchCategory.description: <P>SMC's new PFMB dual color digital flow switch allows for a wide range of flow measurement with one product.  The PFMB is suitable for use with air and nitrogen.  It's compact and space saving with an integrated flow adjustment valve.  The bypass structure limits the contact of moist air with the sensor, reducing degradation of the sensor and helps maintain accuracy.  </P>

branchItem.name: PFMB7201, Digital Flow Switch w/2 Color Display (2 to 200 L/min)
branchItem.description: <P>SMC's new PFMB dual color digital flow switch allows for a wide range of flow measurement with one product.  The PFMB is suitable for use with air and nitrogen.  It's compact and space saving with an integrated flow adjustment valve.  The bypass structure limits the contact of moist air with the sensor, reducing degradation of the sensor and helps maintain accuracy.  </P>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>2-color display improves visibility <LI>Helps promote energy savings <LI>Response time can be set based on application <LI>Integrated flow adjustment valve <LI>Compact and space saving <LI>Expanded flow range </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: PFMB7, Digital Flow Switch w/2 Color Display (5 to 500, 10 to 1000 & 20 to 2000 L/min)
branchItem.description: <P>SMC's new PFMB dual color digital flow switch allows for a wide range of flow measurement with one product.  The PFMB is suitable for use with air and nitrogen.  It's compact and space saving with an integrated flow adjustment valve.  The bypass structure limits the contact of moist air with the sensor, reducing degradation of the sensor and helps maintain accuracy.  </P>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>2-color display improves visibility <LI>Helps promote energy savings <LI>Response time can be set based on application <LI>Integrated flow adjustment valve <LI>Compact and space saving <LI>Expanded flow range </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: PFG3, Digital Flow Monitor for PFMB
branchItem.description: <p>The PFG is SMC's first output monitor with a 3-screen display, primarily suited for pairing with various flow sensors.  A sensor's measured value can be viewed in the primary screen, while a variety of secondary data can be chosen for the sub-screens.  The sub-screens can be set to display target threshold values, an accumulation quantity, or a peak or bottom value.  A text description for their line or location could also be assigned.  While the monitor includes displayable L/min and CFM units, the range input function can scale the connected sensor's analog output signal to any range desired.  This enables the monitor to be used with many other sensor types, such as pressure or temperture sensors.</p>
